akn:section.akn:heading: Use of procedures other than competitive procedures

akn:subsection.akn:heading: When Procedures Other Than Competitive Procedures May Be Used.—

akn:content.akn:p: (a) The head of an agency may use procedures other than competitive procedures only when—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Property or Services Considered to Be Available From Only One Source.—

akn:content.akn:p: (b) For the purposes of applying subsection (a)(1)—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Property or Services Needed With Unusual and Compelling Urgency.—

akn:content.akn:p: (d) The head of an agency using procedures other than competitive procedures to procure property or services by reason of the application of paragraph (2) or (6) of subsection (a) shall request offers from as many potential sources as is practicable under the circumstances.
